code:
sequenceDiagram
    actor User
    participant LoginUI
    participant AuthenticationController
    participant CourseTableUI
    participant CourseTableController
    participant Student

    User->>LoginUI: input username, password
    LoginUI->>AuthenticationController: getUsername(), getPassword()
    AuthenticationController->>Student: authenticate(username, password)
    alt Authentication successful
        Student-->>AuthenticationController: authentication successful
        AuthenticationController->>LoginUI: displaySuccess()
        User->>CourseTableUI: request course table
        CourseTableUI->>CourseTableController: requestCourseTable(studentId)
        alt Student has enrolled courses
            CourseTableController->>Student: checkStudentCourseSelection(studentId)
            Student-->>CourseTableController: true, enrolledCourses
            CourseTableController->>CourseTableController: getCourseTable(enrolledCourses)
            CourseTableController-->>CourseTableUI: displayCourseTable(courseTable)
            CourseTableUI-->>User: display course table
        else Student has no enrolled courses
            CourseTableController-->>CourseTableUI: displayNoCourseMessage()
            CourseTableUI-->>User: display no course message
        end
        
        
    else Authentication failed
        Student-->>AuthenticationController: authentication failed
        AuthenticationController->>LoginUI: displayLoginFailure()
    end

    alt Network error during course table retrieval
        User->>CourseTableUI: request course table
        CourseTableUI->>CourseTableController: requestCourseTable(studentId)
        CourseTableController->>CourseTableController: checkNetworkConnection()
        CourseTableController-->>CourseTableUI: displayNetworkErrorMessage()
        CourseTableUI-->>User: display network error message
    end

    alt Error during course table retrieval
        User->>CourseTableUI: request course table
        CourseTableUI->>CourseTableController: requestCourseTable(studentId)
        CourseTableController->>CourseTableController: handleCourseTableRetrievalFailure()
        CourseTableController-->>CourseTableUI: displayErrorMessage(message)
        CourseTableUI-->>User: display error message
    end
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
